sources.title: Instant Death (ACTION THRILLER with LOU FERRIGNO Movies German complete, full-length action movies)

metadata.Plot: A vicious gang war for drug dominance draws in a disturbed Special Forces veteran John Bradley. Trying to adjust to normal life and haunted by inner demons of a violent past, the underworld's retribution on his last connection to humanity, a daughter and grandchild leads to a descent of fury and violence that not even the brutality of gangland is prepared for.
metadata.Actors: Lou Ferrigno, Jerry Anderson, Tania Staite
